statements: SELECT * FROM delivery_schedules;
SELECT delivery_id, material_type, delivery_date FROM delivery_schedules ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT driver_name, estimated_arrival_time FROM delivery_schedules WHERE material_type = 'Fragile';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_deliveries FROM delivery_schedules;
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedules WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-10-01' AND driver_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedules WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01' AND material_type = 'Electronics' ORDER BY estimated_arrival_time DESC
SELECT delivery_id, driver_name FROM delivery_schedules WHERE shipment_id = 1001 AND material_type IN ('Furniture', 'Appliances')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_deliveries FROM delivery_schedules WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT driver_name, delivery_date FROM delivery_schedules WHERE driver_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY delivery_date
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM delivery_schedules WHERE delivery_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY material_type
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedules;
SELECT delivery_id, shipment_date FROM delivery_schedules WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT location_name, address FROM delivery_locations WHERE contact_person = 'John Smith';
SELECT material_type, quantity FROM delivery_schedules ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, shipment_date, material_type FROM delivery_schedules WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedules WHERE material_type = 'Electronics' ORDER by shipment_date DESC, quantity ASC;

SELECT delivery_id, shipment_date, location_name FROM delivery_schedules JOIN delivery_locations ON delivery_schedules.delivery_id = delivery_locations.delivery_id WHERE location_name LIKE '%City%' AND address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT delivery_id, shipment_date, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM delivery_schedules GROUP BY delivery_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT material_type, COUNT(*) AS total_deliveries FROM delivery_schedules GROUP BY material_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_deliveries DESC;

SELECT shipment_date, material_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM delivery_schedules WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY shipment_date, material_type ORDER BY shipment_date ASC, total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedules;
SELECT delivery_id, material_type, quantity FROM delivery_schedules WHERE shipment_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT city, state FROM delivery_addresses WHERE zipcode = '12345';
SELECT * FROM delivery_status WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT delivery_id, status, timestamp FROM delivery_status ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedules WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, material_type, quantity FROM delivery_schedules WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT delivery_schedules.*, delivery_status.status, delivery_status.timestamp FROM delivery_schedules JOIN delivery_status ON delivery_schedules.delivery_id = delivery_status.delivery_id;
SELECT recipient_name, street_address, city, state, zipcode FROM delivery_addresses WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY recipient_name;

SELECT delivery_schedules.delivery_id, delivery_schedules.material_type, delivery_addresses.recipient_name, delivery_addresses.city FROM delivery_schedules JOIN delivery_addresses ON delivery_schedules.delivery_id = delivery_addresses.address_id;
SELECT * FROM DeliverySchedules;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers;
SELECT material_name, material_category FROM Materials ORDER BY material_category ASC;
SELECT delivery_date, quantity FROM DeliverySchedules WHERE material_type='Wood';
SELECT status, created_at FROM ShipmentStatus WHERE shipment_id=3;
SELECT * FROM DeliverySchedules WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_category FROM Materials WHERE material_category = 'Metal' AND material_name LIKE '%Steel%';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, quantity FROM DeliverySchedules WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT shipment_id, status, created_at FROM ShipmentStatus WHERE status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedule WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date FROM delivery_schedule WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM material WHERE material_type = 'Steel' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM delivery_area WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM supplier WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT * FROM delivery_area;
SELECT material_name, material_type, price FROM material WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT delivery_date, delivery_time, quantity FROM delivery_schedule WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01' AND delivery_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_phone FROM supplier WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT supervisor_name, supervisor_location, contact_email FROM supervisor ORDER BY supervisor_name ASC;
